title: Vicky Pattison considers freezing her eggs amid fears she won't have kids
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Vicky Pattison is considering freezing her eggs amid fears that being single will mean she can not have kids.

The reality star has been dealt with her fair share of heartache, and in the latest episode of No Filter she can be seen discussing with her mum putting plans in place so she can have a family in future.

Speaking to the camera, she said: ‘I have never, ever known a fella worry about having kids. But women, God, I don’t know how many women I’ve had that conversation with.

‘The fact that we have that limit, that timeline on our reproduction is what makes us feel the stress, feel the pressure.’

Telling mum Caroll that she’s hoping to have kids in the next five to 10 years, she admitted that she’s considering her ‘options’ to make sure that it’s still possible when the time comes.

‘I didn’t want kids and I was adamant I didn’t, but I feel like what would my future be without them? And that’s a question I haven’t answered yet, and so I don’t want the door to close,’ she admitted, as her mum revealed that Vicky has only recently started considering it.

Vicky talks through her plans with her mum (Picture: Quest Red)

‘There’s options. So, I can freeze my eggs. I just think it’ll take a little bit of pressure off the way I’m feeling,’ she added.

‘I can just enjoy my life and natural organic process my relationships are taking, rather than thinking “you’re 31, you’ve had a wild ride. So find someone to have babies with.”’

‘Women want more, I’m not going to hinge it all on the fella you know!,’ she added.

Too right, Vicky!

Caroll then joked about ‘whether or not they have a sell-by date’ after they’re frozen as she agrees with her daughter that her decision is the most pro-active one.
